page.title: 02HOUSING IN BURTON HASTINGS
page.content: In the area there are 62 houses, 7 farms and a hospital.There are 44 private houses of which 23 are new, and 18 council houses. The old school, which closed in 1976, has been made into a private house.Burton House farm was built in 1610. It is no longer a dairy farm but has been divided into two homes.One house is said to be haunted by the ghost of a girl who died of a broken heart in 1870. She planned to run away with a soldier but was locked away in her room by her parents. Before she died she wrote " Fond is love they here do not leave me alay" on the window with her diamond ring. The newest house in the village is being built from old materials.
